content.rendered:
Directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra.

Written by Gulzar.

Cast Harshvardhan Kapoor(Munish / Adil). Saiyami Kher(Suchitra).Art Malik. Anuj Choudhry(Karan). Om Puri(Abba).K.K. Raina . Sathya Bg(Blacksmith). Arvind Goswami(Police constable). Anjali Patil(Zeenat). Vikram Shankar Singh(Teacher (as Vikram Singh))

Language Hindi.

Producers P.S. Bharathi. Ollwyn Dsouza. Md Anan Islam. Rohit Khattar. Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra. Shyam P.S.. Rajiv Tandon.

Production Cinestaan International. Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra Pictures.
